title: Stuck on Logging on
body:
I've already lost my cool about this idiotic issue that should not be in a game like LoL, but i'll stay calm.

Whenever I try to log on, it just takes forever and doesn't even log me on. I have tried full repairs, running as admin, using both clients, and nothing seems to fucking work.

Someone please help me, because if issues like that on the most popular game in the world will happen, the devs are being really lackluster.

Sorry if im being a bit rude, im just extremely mad over this whole thing.
